text: Buck Kartalian (August 13, 1922 - May 24, 2016) was an American actor. He appeared in more than 70 movies and television shows between 1953 and 2006. He was born in Detroit, Michigan. Kartalian was known for his roles in Cool Hand Luke (1967), Planet of the Apes (1968), Conquest of the Planet of the Apes (1972), The Outlaw Josey Wales (1976) and in The Rock (1996) Kartalian died on May 24, 2016 in Mission Hills, California, aged 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Detroit
title: Buck Kartalian
